"Photo focused" websites for landscaping companies

Your landscaping work is impeccable and your clients love you, but you’re having trouble attracting new clients through your website.

It’s time to make your site look as professional as your landscaping work does.

Simple and professional

Merely having a website isn't enough. Give your visitor's an experience they'll remember.

show

Prominently feature photographs of your work.

engage

Reach out to visitors by giving them ways to connect with you.

adjust

Designs that look great on laptops, tablets, and phones.

Have a website that reflects the quality of your work

When you’re trying to make an impression on a potential customer, visuals matter (and this is two fold):

First, the design of your website should match the high level of quality you provide clients through landscaping.

Second, don’t hide away your project photos on the gallery page, make sure they’re everywhere!

The nitty gritty

Fast. Simple. Custom. By using Cloud Cannon, you get the speed benifits of a flat-file website, the templating power of Jekyll and Liquid, and to top it all off: gloriously simple in-page editing.

in-page editing

Login, then click and start typing. Editable regions will be highlighted in yellow.

no database

Typically, websites load quicker when they don't need to connect to a database.

crop images

Easily crop and zoom images to get your photos just right.

Ready for a new site?

The nitty gritty

Fast. Simple. Custom. By using Cloud Cannon, you get the speed benifits of a flat-file website, the templating power of Jekyll and Liquid, and to top it all off: gloriously simple in-page editing.

in-page editing

Login, then click and start typing. Editable regions will be highlighted in yellow.

no database

Typically, websites load quicker when they don't need to connect to a database.
